channel.title: 562| Item on Item
channel.description:
[CENTER]Okay so i'm currently working on a little project. My client is looking like this so far, [IMG]http://i281.photobucket.com/albums/kk226/chad0ck/pic1.png[/img]
I have this added into the Jframe as "auto crafter" please note this was just a test for the Jframe. [SPOILER="Code"] case 2: JOptionPane.showConfirmDialog(null, "choose one", "What would you like to craft?", JOptionPane.DSTONES_ONYXS_OPTION); break;[/SPOILER] Now the part i'm confused about, How would I come across making this button from the Jframe make the client use an item on another item. For example, a chisel on a sapphire 27 times then make the script stop. I will reward a BF3 for pc to who ever helps me. I want help, not free coding. (I would like to learn from this). I need to some how convert this code to work on a client. if (use == 1755 && useWith == 1755 ) { [/CENTER]

item.title: 562| Item on Item

[CENTER]Okay so i’m currently working on a little project.
My client is looking like this so far,

I have this added into the Jframe as “auto crafter” please note this was just a test for the Jframe.
[SPOILER=“Code”] case 2:
JOptionPane.showConfirmDialog(null,
“choose one”, “What would you like to craft?”, JOptionPane.DSTONES_ONYXS_OPTION);
break;[/SPOILER]
Now the part i’m confused about, How would I come across making this button from the Jframe make the client use an item on another item. For example, a chisel on a sapphire 27 times then make the script stop.
I will reward a BF3 for pc to who ever helps me. I want help, not free coding. (I would like to learn from this).
